TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientWebSocket extends System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket implements class System.IDisposable
Public Class ClientWebSocket Inherits WebSocket Implements IDisposable
public ref class ClientWebSocket : System::Net::WebSockets::WebSocket, IDisposable
type ClientWebSocket = class inherit WebSocket interface IDisposable

summary.span: 提供用于连接到 WebSocket 服务的客户端。

span.span: Provides a client for connecting to WebSocket services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一些类和类中的元素的命名空间支持在 Windows 7、 Windows Vista SP2 和 Windows Server 2008 上。Some of the classes and class elements in the namespace are supported on Windows 7, Windows Vista SP2, and Windows Server 2008. 但是，在 Windows 8 和 Windows Server 2012 上支持的客户端和服务器 Websocket 仅对公共实现。However, the only public implementations of client and server WebSockets are supported on Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012. 中的类元素支持在 Windows 7、 Windows Vista SP2 和 Windows Server 2008 的命名空间都是抽象类的元素。The class elements in the namespace that are supported on Windows 7, Windows Vista SP2, and Windows Server 2008 are abstract class elements. 这允许继承并扩展这些抽象类的类和类元素与实际的客户端 Websocket 实现应用程序开发人员。This allows an application developer to inherit and extend these abstract class classes and class elements with an actual implementation of client WebSockets.

summary.span: 中止连接并取消任何挂起的 IO 操作。

span.span: Aborts the connection and cancels any pending IO operations.

remarks.span: `ClientWebSocket`后会被中止时不能重复使用。

span.span: The `ClientWebSocket` cannot be reused once it is aborted.

summary.span: 关闭 实例以作为异步操作。

span.span: Close the instance as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象将完成后实例已关闭。The returned object will complete after the instance is closed.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象将在输出后将完成上实例已关闭。The returned object will complete after the output on the instance is closed.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task ConnectAsync (Uri uri, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task ConnectAsync(class System.Uri uri, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
public: System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ ConnectAsync(Uri ^ uri, System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);
member this.ConnectAsync : Uri * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

param.name: uri
param.span: 要连接到的 WebSocket 服务器的 URI。

span.span: The URI of the WebSocket server to connect to.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 可用于传播应取消操作的通知的取消标记。

span.span: A cancellation token used to propagate notification that the operation should be canceled.

summary.span: 连接到 WebSocket 服务器以作为异步操作。

span.span: Connect to a WebSocket server as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法启动与远程网络目标，WebSocket 握手，然后协商子协议。The method initiates the WebSocket handshake with a remote network destination, and then negotiates the sub-protocol. 对于普通的 WebSocket 连接，使用`ws://`在 uri 中的方案。For plain WebSocket connections, use the `ws://` scheme in the uri. 对于通过 TLS/SSL 安全 WebSocket 连接，使用`wss://`方案。For secure WebSocket connections over TLS/SSL, use the `wss://` scheme. 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象将连接请求后完成上实例已完成。The returned object will complete after the connect request on the instance has completed.

summary.span: 将 上的数据作为异步操作进行接收。

span.span: Receives data on as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象将接收请求后完成上实例已完成。The returned object will complete after the receive request on the instance has completed. 只有一个发送和接收每个支持并行中的对象。Exactly one send and one receive is supported on each object in parallel.
